knimeNode.name: Path to String
knimeNode.shortDescription: Converts a Path column into a String column.

intro.p: This node converts a selected Path column into a column of the type String.

p.i: For further information about file handling in general see the

fullDescription.option: The Path column that will be converted to a String column.

ul.li: Append column: Append the new column to the table with the selected column name.
Replace: Replace the selected column with the new String column.

option.name: Create KNIME URL for 'Relative to' and 'Mounpoint' file systems

fullDescription.option: This option is only relevant for paths with the Relative to workflow data area, Relative to workflow, Relative to mountpoint or Mountpoint file system. If checked, a String is created that contains a KNIME URL. Such a KNIME URL starts with "knime://" and can be used to e.g. control legacy reader nodes via flow variables. If unchecked, a String is created that contains solely the path, i.e. without the knime protocol and hostname. Such a String can e.g. be used for manipulations and converted back to a Path using the String to Path node.

ports.inPort: Table that contains a Path column.
ports.outPort: The input table containing the converted column.
